analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/47/0x1564a87c736cd84edce14e09de8907fdece0ccab.sol:
	Contract TransmuteToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/47/0x1564a87c736cd84edce14e09de8907fdece0ccab.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/47/0x1564a87c736cd84edce14e09de8907fdece0ccab.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
